nodes.description: Central African Republic is governed as a Electoral autocracy. Top exports include gold, wood, diamonds, vehicle parts/accessories, cotton. Key trading partners are UAE, China, France. External debt is $776.149 million. Corruption Index: 24, HDI: 0.387.

Sudan is governed as a Closed autocracy. Top exports include crude petroleum, gold, oil seeds, sheep and goats, ground nuts. Key trading partners are UAE, China, Saudi Arabia. External debt is $21.878 billion. Corruption Index: 15, HDI: 0.516.

Kenya is governed as a Electoral democracy. Top exports include tea, cut flowers, garments, gold, tropical fruits. Key trading partners are Uganda, USA, UAE/Netherlands. External debt is $33.484 billion. Corruption Index: 32, HDI: 0.601.

Libya is governed as a Closed autocracy. Top exports include crude petroleum, natural gas, refined petroleum, gold, scrap iron. Key trading partners are Italy, Germany, Spain. External debt is nan. Corruption Index: 13, HDI: 0.746.

Mali is governed as a Closed autocracy. Top exports include gold, cotton, oil seeds, fertilizers, gum resins. Key trading partners are UAE, Switzerland, Australia. External debt is $4.535 billion. Corruption Index: 27, HDI: 0.410.

Georgia is governed as a Electoral democracy. Top exports include cars, copper ore, electricity, garments, wine. Key trading partners are Azerbaijan, Turkey, Armenia. External debt is $9.791 billion. Corruption Index: 53, HDI: 0.814.
Palestine is governed as a Electoral autocracy. Top exports include nan. Key trading partners are nan. External debt is nan. Corruption Index: nan, HDI: 0.716.

Israel is governed as a Electoral democracy. Top exports include integrated circuits, diamonds, broadcasting equipment, medical instruments, refined petroleum. Key trading partners are USA, China, Ireland. External debt is nan. Corruption Index: 64, HDI: 0.915.

Russia is governed as a Electoral autocracy. Top exports include crude petroleum, refined petroleum, natural gas, coal, fertilizers. Key trading partners are China, India, Turkey. External debt is $135.301 billion. Corruption Index: 22, HDI: 0.821.

Uganda is governed as a Electoral autocracy. Top exports include gold, coffee, fish, refined petroleum, tobacco. Key trading partners are India, UAE, Hong Kong. External debt is $11.436 billion. Corruption Index: 26, HDI: 0.548.
